com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.servlet.response

Interface WithErrorResponse

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbapInterfaceNotSupportedException, AccessDeniedException, AccessDeniedException, CloudConnectorException, DestinationAccessException, DestinationNotFoundException, DestinationOAuthTokenException, DestinationTypeNotSupportedException, ErpEditionNotSupportedException, ErpReleaseNotSupportedException, FeatureNotEnabledException, ForbiddenOperationException, IcfServiceAccessDeniedException, InvalidParameterException, InvalidParameterException, LogonErrorException, MissingConfigException, MissingErpConfigException, MissingParameterException, MissingParameterException, NotImplementedException, NotImplementedException, ParameterNotFoundException, PayloadTooLargeException, QueryExecutionException, QuerySignatureException, RemoteFunctionCommitFailedException, RemoteFunctionException, RemoteFunctionRollbackFailedException, ServiceNotAvailableException, UserAccessDeniedException, UserNotAuthenticatedException, UserNotInRoleException, VersionNotSupportedException, WrongCustomizingException

    public interface WithErrorResponse
    Stating the ability to return an response containing an error code.

    Mainly used by exceptions that want to return an HTTP error code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResponseWithErrorCode getErrorResponse()
      Gets the response containing an HTTP error code.

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorResponse

        ResponseWithErrorCode getErrorResponse()
        Gets the response containing an HTTP error code.
        Returns:
        The error response.
